name: BACK FROM THE DEAD (Stefano Cagnani V3)
name_original: BACK FROM THE DEAD (Stefano Cagnani V3)
description: With this short game I want to pay homage to Romero for his works. I tried to recreate the same atmosphere of his films and the same tension. All in VHS style so no music but only sound effects. Plot is not essential when you have good art direction and well done tension!
